solution_line_template: Lisa's mother gave her {mother_fraction}*${saved_amount} = $<<{mother_fraction}*{saved_amount}={mother_contribution}>>{mother_contribution} for her birthday gift.
She also received {brother_multiplier}*${mother_contribution} = $<<{brother_multiplier}*{mother_contribution}={brother_contribution}>>{brother_contribution} from her brother for the gift.

If she still had to find ${remaining_needed} to fully reach her birthday gift cost, it means her gift's total cost was ${saved_amount}+${brother_contribution}+${mother_contribution}+${remaining_needed} = $<<{saved_amount}+{brother_contribution}+{mother_contribution}+{remaining_needed}={gift_price}>>{gift_price}
